name: Caves of Gold (TRy Dev)
description:
Find gold in a cave and get rich!

More than 30 levels with increasing difficulty and new mechanics.

Playtime: ~20 mins.

Controls:
WASD / arrows - movement

Z - undo move

R - restart level
